Edges-Social -- Male Avion Veteran Adventurer
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Brave: +2 Spirit vs. fear, -2 fear table roll
Iron Will: +2 vs. Powers
Strong Willed: +2 Smarts (resist Tests)/+2 Spirit (resist Tests)
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d8 Intimidation: (spi) d4+2 Repair: (sma) d6
Battle: (sma) d4 Language (Avion): (sma) d8 Stealth: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d8 Survival: (sma) d6
Fighting: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-3 Taunt: (sma) d8
Skill Notes:
Keen Senses (Avion): +1 Notice step
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Menacing: +2 Intimidation
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion
Work The Crowd: Increased Work The Room effects
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Flight: Uses Athletics for flight maneuvers
Humiliate: Reroll Taunt
Rabble-Rouser: Taunt or Intimidate all enemies in 2" radius
Reliable: Reroll Support
Retort: Raise on Intimidation or Taunt Test causes foe to be Distracted
Streetwise: +2 Intimidation (criminal network)/+2 Persuasion (criminal network)/+2 Common Knowledge (criminals)
Work The Room: +1 Performance or Persuasion step in Support 2/rd
Size: 0
Advances: 9 Improvement Points: 22 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 10; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (6 points): Bolster; Brave; Common Bond; Connections; Humiliate; Iron Will; Menacing; Provoke; Rabble-Rouser; Reliable; Retort; Streetwise; Strong Willed; Work The Crowd; Work The Room Hindrances: Cautious; Mean; Ugly+ Avion Features: Can't Swim; Flight; Frail; Keen Senses (Avion); Reduced Pace
Feature Notes:
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Common Bond: Communication allows transfer of Bennies to allies
Connections: Call in favors from acquaintance or organization
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Combat
Parry: 7 (3) Cover: -4 Toughness: 7 (3) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Bronze Corselet Shield: Ballistic Shield Weapons: Dagger: 1 (d8+d4 R3"); Gatling Gun: 1 (2d8 R24"); Long Bow: 1 (2d6 R15"); Unarmed: 1 (d8+d0)

Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Frail: -1 Toughness
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Bolster: Successful foe Test removes Distracted or Vulnerable from ally
Can't Swim: Move 1/3 speed through water
Flight: Fly Pace 12
Provoke: Raise on Taunt inflicts -2 on foe attacks on other targets; joker Action Card ends
